verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came again unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Howl <S%H3213><s%> ye, Woe worth <S%H1929><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%>!

For the day <S%H3117><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%>, even the day <S%H3117><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%>, a cloudy <S%H6051><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>; it shall be the time <S%H6256><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>.

And the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and great pain <S%H2479><s%> shall be in Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%>, when the slain <S%H2491><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and they shall take away <S%H3947><s%> her multitude <S%H1995><s%>, and her foundations <S%H3247><s%> shall be broken down <S%H2040><s%>. pain: or, fear

Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%>, and Libya <S%H6316><s%>, and Lydia <S%H3865><s%>, and all the mingled <S%H6153><s%> people, and Chub <S%H3552><s%>, and the men <S%H1121><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> that is in league <S%H1285><s%>, shall fall <S%H5307><s%> with them by the sword <S%H2719><s%>. Libya: Heb. Phut men: Heb. children

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; They also that uphold <S%H5564><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%>; and the pride <S%H1347><s%> of her power <S%H5797><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%>: from the tower <S%H4024><s%> of Syene <S%H5482><s%> shall they fall <S%H5307><s%> in it by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>. from: or, from Migdol to Syene

And they shall be desolate <S%H8074><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the countries <S%H776><s%> that are desolate <S%H8074><s%>, and her cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are wasted <S%H2717><s%>.

And they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, when I have set <S%H5414><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and when all her helpers <S%H5826><s%> shall be destroyed <S%H7665><s%>. destroyed: Heb. broken

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall messengers <S%H4397><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%> from me <S%H6440><s%> in ships <S%H6716><s%> to make the careless <S%H983><s%> Ethiopians <S%H3568><s%> afraid <S%H2729><s%>, and great pain <S%H2479><s%> shall come upon them, as in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: for, lo, it cometh <S%H935><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; I will also make the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

He and his people <S%H5971><s%> with him, the terrible <S%H6184><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, shall be brought <S%H935><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>: and they shall draw <S%H7324><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> against Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and fill <S%H4390><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> with the slain <S%H2491><s%>.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> the rivers <S%H2975><s%> dry <S%H2724><s%>, and sell <S%H4376><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7451><s%>: and I will make the land <S%H776><s%> waste <S%H8074><s%>, and all that is therein <S%H4393><s%>, by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of strangers <S%H2114><s%>: I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it. dry: Heb. drought all: Heb. the fulness thereof

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; I will also destroy <S%H6><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%>, and I will cause their images <S%H457><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> out of Noph <S%H5297><s%>; and there shall be no more a prince <S%H5387><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and I will put <S%H5414><s%> a fear <S%H3374><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And I will make Pathros <S%H6624><s%> desolate <S%H8074><s%>, and will set <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in Zoan <S%H6814><s%>, and will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> in No <S%H4996><s%>. Zoan: or, Tanis

And I will pour <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon Sin <S%H5512><s%>, the strength <S%H4581><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of No <S%H4996><s%>. Sin: or, Pelusium

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: Sin <S%H5512><s%> shall have great <S%H2342><s%> pain <S%H2342><s%>, and No <S%H4996><s%> shall be rent asunder <S%H1234><s%>, and Noph <S%H5297><s%> shall have distresses <S%H6862><s%> daily <S%H3119><s%>.

The young men <S%H970><s%> of Aven <S%H206><s%> and of Pibeseth <S%H6364><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>: and these cities shall go <S%H3212><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%>. Aven: or, Heliopolis Pibeseth: or, Pubastum

At Tehaphnehes <S%H8471><s%> also the day <S%H3117><s%> shall be darkened <S%H2821><s%> <S%H2820><s%>, when I shall break <S%H7665><s%> there the yokes <S%H4133><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and the pomp <S%H1347><s%> of her strength <S%H5797><s%> shall cease <S%H7673><s%> in her <S%H1931><s%>: as for her, a cloud <S%H6051><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> her, and her daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%>. darkened: or, restrained
Thus will I execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And it came to pass in the eleventh <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the first <S%H7223><s%> month, in the seventh <S%H7651><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the arm <S%H2220><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and, lo, it shall not be bound up <S%H2280><s%> to be healed <S%H7499><s%> <S%H5414><s%>, to put <S%H7760><s%> a roller <S%H2848><s%> to bind <S%H2280><s%> it, to make it strong <S%H2388><s%> to hold <S%H8610><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I am against Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and will break <S%H7665><s%> his arms <S%H2220><s%>, the strong <S%H2389><s%>, and that which was broken <S%H7665><s%>; and I will cause the sword <S%H2719><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%> out of his hand <S%H3027><s%>.
And I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and will disperse <S%H2219><s%> them through the countries <S%H776><s%>.

And I will strengthen <S%H2388><s%> the arms <S%H2220><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>: but I will break <S%H7665><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> arms <S%H2220><s%>, and he shall groan <S%H5008><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him with the groanings <S%H5009><s%> of a deadly wounded <S%H2491><s%> man.

But I will strengthen <S%H2388><s%> the arms <S%H2220><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and the arms <S%H2220><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> shall fall down <S%H5307><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, when I shall put <S%H5414><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and he shall stretch it out <S%H5186><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them among the countries <S%H776><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
